1.title: Best of: Pools

episode of.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Vanilla Ice looks back at the last five mansions that he's flipped in West Palm Beach, FL and counts down his favorite pool renovations.

2.title: Best of: Kitchens

episode of.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Vanilla Ice counts down his favorite kitchen renovations with help from celebrity chef Guy Fieri.

3.title: Best of: Master Suites

episode of.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Vanilla Ice revisits his favorite iced out master suite makeovers.

4.title: Best of: Landscaping

episode of.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Rob takes a look back on his favorite extreme landscaping makeovers.

5.title: Best of: Boom Rooms

episode of.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: There's the right way, the wrong way, and the VIP way to do the ultimate room flip.

imdb.plot outline: The one and only Vanilla Ice takes us behind the curtain to share his most outrageous and over-the-top mansion makeovers ever. Get an inside look at how he and his crew of contractors overcome massive construction obstacles to turn high dollar dumps into stunning residences.
imdb.title: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of
akas: The Vanilla Ice Project: Best Of (United States)
